Content.Text:
<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
With you there to carry my things for me, Lillie,
we got back to my house in no time flat!
<PAGE>
Thank you, lassie!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
You're welcome, Grandpa Otmar. I'm glad I
could be a help.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But you're lucky I happened across you today.
<PAGE>
If I hadn't been there, you might have been stuck
lying on your back like an overturned turtle until
morning!
<PAGE>
You need to be more careful when you have
heavy things to carry.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll be careful, lassie. I'll be careful.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Though I have to say, it sure was a sight! I up-
ended flat on my back, with my legs still kickin'
in the air!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>C'mon, Grandpa Otmar. It's not a laughing
matter!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Anyway, I have to get going. If you ever have
anything heavy to carry again, come get me or
someone else to help. Okay?
<PAGE>
<FACE_OTMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>I will, I will. Leave it to me, lassie!

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah! Lillie! I was just looking for you.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hi, Corona! What did you need to see me for?

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Remember when I came to you for some fashion
advice?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Well, you were right on the money! I did what
you suggested, and my hubby was all
compliments! So I wanted to thank you.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Really? That's great! I'm glad I spent so much
time thinking about what would work best for
you!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHLOE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>If you don't mind, can I ask for your advice
again?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>Sure! If you're okay with coming to me, I'll help
you out as much as you want!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHLOE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Thanks, Lillie.
<PAGE>
You're so knowledgeable about the latest fashion
trends that asking you is like having a cheat
sheet!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>I'm glad to hear that!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Though it's all just stuff I overhear from the
Fashion Corner TV spot at work.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Really? Hunh! That makes sense. Still, it's all
good to know! I'll let you know if everything
pans out again. ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Well, I'll let you go, now. Sorry to hold you up.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>It's okay. Good luck!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wah! <MYNAME>! Y-you surprised me, popping
up out of nowhere like that. What's up?
You're a nice person.
You've gotta be bored.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? I've never really thought of myself as all
that especially nice or anything. What brought
that up?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What?! You've been watching since I helped
Grandpa Otmar carry his things?! Why didn't you
say something?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I-it's kinda embarrassing to hear you make such
a big fuss over that stuff.
<PAGE>
It wasn't like I tried to be a busy-body. I just
happened to be around when someone needed
help. It's nothing major.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I mean, it's not like you'd stand around ignoring
someone who needed help, right?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Same principle.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Still, helping someone does give you the warm
fuzzies, doesn't it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I just like seeing how happy the other person is.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's why at first I wanted to be a nurse or a
social worker, or some other job where I could
help people...
<PAGE>
But, um...that's not really where my talents are, I
guess...
<PAGE>
So I thought about what other kinds of jobs
might be out there, where I could help put a
smile on people's faces.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>After a while, I decided on the job I have now.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, hey. While we're on the subject, what made
you decide to be a farmer, <MYNAME>?
I like growing things.
Because it makes money.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, okay. Yeah, raising plants and animals and
stuff is probably really hard, but it sounds like
it's fun and rewarding, too.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>That's definitely an awesome reason. I'm not
surprised that's why you do it, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
Let's both keep giving our jobs our best, so we
can keep making people happy, 'kay?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah! Look at the time. I've got to get going.
<PAGE>
I'm really glad I got a chance to know you better
today, <MYNAME>. Thanks for coming to see
me.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
See you later! Bye-bye!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
O-oh. Um, okay. You're a lot more up front
about what you want than I expected,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yeah, I guess we all need money, right? It's as
good a reason as any to take a job.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hee hee! Anyways, I'd better get going.
<PAGE>
I'm really glad I got a chance to know you better
today, <MYNAME>. Thanks for coming to see
me. See you later!

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Huh? Bored? Where did that come from?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What?! You've been watching since I helped
Grandpa Otmar carry his things?!
<PAGE>
Oh, um...but I didn't really do that because I was
bored and had nothing better to do.
<PAGE>
I mean, it's not like you'd stand around ignoring
someone who needed help, right?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It was the same thing for me. I couldn't just
stand there and not help.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Though if you're going to walk around just
watching me, I'd think you'd have to be pretty
bored yourself...

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hee hee! I'm just kidding.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Anyways, I'd better get going. See you later,
<MYNAME>!
